name: Nefarium
description:
Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons for INSANE loot.

This game is currently in development, missing heavy features that will eventually come.

This iteration of Nefarium features a fallen, vengeful angel of death that seeks to take back what was once theirs. The fallen reaper must go through the trails of the dungeons in order to get back a fraction of his power and seek vengeance.

Nefarium is a rogue-like dungeon plunder game where the player must go through a randomly generated dungeon to defeat the boss at the end. The challenge gradually increases as difficulty rises with each floor, but the angel does have some friends that can help on the journey.

What's coming?

- Sound/Music
- More bosses, more monsters
- Anvil (To create items)
- Enchanter (To upgrade items)
- Forge (To destroy items)
- Appearance changer + female model
- Targeted Abilities
- Out of combat animations + better animations overall
- 2 handed weapons
- More item models
- Online parties (eventually)
- "Puzzles" or rooms with more variety in them

And more!
